name: Computer Crashed!!!
description:
You just got in your next repair one problem i don't think they knew how to build a computer, but it might just WORK!?!

Controls:

  • Left Click on Parts to Pick Them Up
  • Hold Right Click While Holding Parts to Rotate Them
  • Press Space to Get Your Rating
  • Press ESC to Close the Game (.exe Version Only)

all audio used was from Freesound.org

Parts List:

  •  = Mother Board
  •  = Ram
  • = GPU
  • = Hard Drive
  •   = Power Supply
  •   = Fan
